mapper.select: select cr_no from ( select cr_no, rownum from chatting_room order by cr_enroll_date desc) where rownum = 1
select cr.cr_no from chatting_participation cp join chatting_room cr on cp.cr_no = cr.cr_no where chat_user_no = #{ userNo } and cr.status = 'Y' and cp.status = 'Y' order by chat_in_date desc

select msg_no, msg_content, send_date, user_name, user_no, profile_url from (select msg_no, msg_content, to_char(send_date, 'HH24:MI') as "SEND_DATE", user_name, cm.user_no, profile_url, rownum from chatting_message cm, member m where cm.user_no = m.user_no and cm.status = 'Y' and cr_no = #{ roomNo } order by send_date desc) where rownum <= 30 order by send_date
mapper.update: update chatting_participation set chat_in_date = sysdate where user_no = #{userNo} and cr_no = #{roomNo}
